snippet: The government-backed mortgage finance giant appointed Timothy Mayopoulos, who was ousted in a shake-up at Bank of America at the height of the financial crisis.
abstract: Fannie Mae names Timothy J Mayopoulos as its next chief executive; Mayopoulos joined the government-backed mortgage finance giant as its general council in 2009 after being ousted in a shake-up at Bank of America at the height of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The government-backed mortgage finance giant appointed Timothy Mayopoulos, who was ousted in a shake-up at Bank of America at the height of the financial crisis.

headline.seo: Fannie Mae Names a Chief Executive
headline.main: Fannie Mae Names Its Top Lawyer as Chief
headline.print_headline: Fannie Mae Names Its Top Lawyer as Chief
